template.name: cns
template.description: 초기 생성자 constructor

template.name: cwm
template.description: DOM위에 만들어지기 전에 componentWillMount

template.name: cdm
template.description: DOM초기화는 여기 componentDidMount

template.name: cwr
template.description: PROP을 새로 받을때 componentWillReceiveProps

template.name: cwup
template.description: COMPONENT가 업데이트 되기전 componentWillUpdate

template.name: cdup
template.description: COMPONENT 리렌더링 마친 후 componentDidUpdate

template.name: cwun
template.description: DOM에서 사라질 때 componentWillUnmount

template.name: scu
template.description: PROP, STATE 변경 될 때 shouldComponentUpdate

template.name: rsc
template.description: const stateless 함수

template.name: gdsfp
template.description: cwm, cwr 대신에 사용 getDerivedStateFromProps

template.name: gsbu
template.description: cwup 대신에 사용 getSnapshotBeforeUpdate, 반환이 cdup arg[3]

template.name: con
template.description: Adds a default constructor for the class that contains props as arguments

template.name: conc
template.description: Adds a default constructor for the class that contains props and context as arguments

template.description: Creates a React component class with PropTypes and ES6 module system

template.description: Creates a React component class connected to redux

template.name: rcfc
template.description: Creates a React component class with PropTypes and all lifecycle methods and ES6 module system

template.name: rscp
template.description: Creates a stateless React component with PropTypes and ES6 module system

template.name: ren
template.description: When called, it should examine this.props and this.state and return a single child element.

template.name: ssf
template.description: Performs a shallow merge of nextState into current state

template.name: rwwd
